io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization

Class DefaultAuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization.DefaultAuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider

    @Singleton
 @Requires(beans={AuthenticationRequestProvider.class,OpenIdProviderMetadata.class})
public class DefaultAuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider
    Default implementation of AuthorizationRedirectUrlProvider.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
